extensions.description: Extensions for card art game objects.

sprite.description: Reference to the card art sprite and forms the base sprite of the card optimally sized ~210x210. Unused for animated card art. Use base_layer+layers instead.

shader.description: Which shader to use, this is an advanced property only set if you know what you are doing. Ignored if base_layer/layers is not set.

base_layer.description: Base layer, should be of type texture with the texture being optimally sized ~210x210.

transforms.description: CardEffectTransform configurations. Modifies the position, rotation, scale of a particular layer(s). The base layer does not have an associated transform.
